title: On goodness-of-fit testing for self-exciting point processes
authors: Jos\'e C. F. Kling and Mathias Vetter
abstract:
Despite the wide usage of parametric point processes in theory and
applications, a sound goodness-of-fit procedure to test whether a given
parametric model is appropriate for data coming from a self-exciting point
processes has been missing in the literature. In this work, we establish a
bootstrap-based goodness-of-fit test which empirically works for all kinds of
self-exciting point processes (and even beyond). In an infill-asymptotic
setting we also prove its asymptotic consistency, albeit only in the particular
case that the underlying point process is inhomogeneous Poisson.
